name: The Last Hope (itch) (Matalla Interactive)
description:
• Hand drawn art (on paper).
  • Few but important narrative choices.
  • 5 endings.
  • Progress screen to track the endings and music unlocked.
Gameplay
  • Take care of yourself and survive.
  • Explore the world,
  • Find resources.
  • Craft items.
  • Solve puzzles.
  • Complete quests.
Endings

Discover all 5 endings and collect up to 7 possible pulp style vintage covers. Some endings have some variations and there's one extra cover (with the outstanding cover art from Undead Maiden) for unlocking all of them.

Credits
  • Writing, game art, coding, design and music: Mario Matalla
  • Cover art and beta testing: Undead Maiden
  • Beta testing: Ceb Theory
  • Interface icons: game-icons.net
  • Shepard tone effect: mynoise.net
